text: Benoit is a French name. Benoit may also refer to: ==Places== *Benoit, Alabama, an unincorporated community, United States *Benoit, Minnesota, an unincorporated community, United States *Benoit, Mississippi, a town, United States *Benoit, Texas, an unincorporated community, United States *Benoit, Wisconsin, an unincorporated community, United States ==Other== *Benoit (book), 2007 book about professional wrestler Chris Benoit *Chris Benoit (1967-2007), Canadian professional wrestler, known also for the double-murder suicide *Chris Benoit (song), 2012 song by Insane Clown Posse and Mike E. Clark *Nancy Benoit (1964-2007), American professional wrestling valet and wife of Chris Benoit ==See also== *Bénédicte (disambiguation)
title: Benoit (disambiguation)
